thread.title: A Bright and Smart San Fran Studio — House Call
thread.title_full: A Bright and Smart San Fran Studio — House Call

author: Apartment Therapy Submissions
title: A Bright and Smart San Fran Studio — House Call
text:
Name: Kirstie Location: Fillmore Jazz District — San Francisco, California 
My studio is 420 square feet. I'm lucky I have East facing windows that overlook a pretty stellar viewpoint of the neighborhood, and all my furnishings fit in just right. I love being home, it's tranquil, full of plants, and steps from some of the best views in the Bay. 
Thanks, Kirstie! 
• Interested in sharing your home with Apartment Therapy? Contact the editors through our House Tour & House Call Submission Form .
